participant_1.name: Rachel
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and responsible, she strives to balance her personal goals and family life.
participant_1.background: My hands were always greasy from working on cars. I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon. I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby. I love to play soccer in the park because it is a great way to stay active and connect with my friends. Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, he enjoys expressing himself through baking and music.
participant_2.background: I like going to Halloween parties because I can dress up and be someone else. I never learned how to drive. I listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris. Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs. I finally got up the courage to try a new exercise class and really enjoyed it!

content.text: I recently quit smoking for the sake of my baby and I'm feeling great!
Congratulations! What made you decide to quit?
I wanted to be a good role model for my child and I knew that smoking would increase my risk of heart disease and cancer.
That's so responsible of you! I'm sure your child will be proud of you.
Thank you! I'm trying my best to be a good mother.
I'm sure you are! What are your favorite hobbies?
I love to play soccer, bake, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to bake too. Do you have a favorite recipe?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies. They're so easy and delicious!
Chocolate chip cookies are my favorite too! I love to add nuts to mine.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that next time.
You should! I'm sure you'll love it.
